title: Nailbomb Cults - The Haunter of the Dark - 2008 UK Breakcore
description:
Brand New 2008 Album from underground UK Breakcore / Gabber / Noise artist The Nailbomb Cults, released on the CITV Mashup Crew label.

10 tracks of frantic dark and nihilistic splatterbreak amen-noise action, reminiscent of Venetian Snares &#039;Winnipeg...&#039; album. Also featuring 3 superb remixes from rising UK breakcore talents Kragle, Hellboy and Jakecore.

Will definatly appeal to fans of Venetian Snares, Igor, Hellfish, Aaron Spectre, Shitmat, Bong Ra, Sickboy, Enduser, Shitmat, Atari Teenage Riot, Duran Duran Duran and other miscellaneous breakcore & speedcore artists.

--------------------------------------------------

The Nailbomb Cults - The Haunter of the Dark

 1. Amentalist Style
 2. Mountains of Madness
 3. August Underground
 4. Ball Crush
 5. Broken Air
 6. DoubleDrum
 7. Cooties
 8. Down with the Clown RMX (original by Nwodtlem)
 9. Flashnoir
10. Forbidden Secrets of the Women&#039;s Institute
11. Mountains of Madness (Kragle Remix)
12. Amentalist Style (Jakecore Remix)
13. Mountains of Madness (Hellboy Remix)

.rar comes complete with cd artwork
